## Loading libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(patchwork)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library("quarto")
```

Create results folder if non exisisting

```{r}
# Create results folder if non-existing
if (!dir.exists("results")) {
  dir.create("results")
}

```

We will use quarto::render \## Loading data

```{r}

# Render the other .qmd files
quarto::quarto_render("01_load.qmd", output_file = "results/01_load.html")

```

## clean data

```{r}

quarto::quarto_render("02_clean.qmd", output_file = "results/02_clean.html")

```
